content1: "The magic of a computer lies in its ability to become almost anything you can imagine, as long as you can explain exactly what that is.
content2:
"With the right programming, a computer can become a theater, a musical instrument, a reference book, a chess opponent. No other entity in the world except a human being has such an adaptable, universal nature.

Engineers don't think the glass is half empty or half full. They just think the glass needs to be redesigned."
